original_text: People who eat anything must not think that they are better than people who eat only vegetables. Also, people who eat only vegetables must not judge other people who eat anything. They are not doing anything wrong, because God himself has accepted them.
korean_text: 먹는 자는 먹지 않는 자를 업신여기지 말고 먹지 않는 자는 먹는 자를 비판하지 말라 이는 하나님이 그를 받으셨음이라

sentences.original_text: must not think that they are better than people who eat only vegetables
sentences.korean_translation: 채식만 하는 사람들보다 자신이 더 낫다고 생각해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: Also, people who eat only vegetables
must not judge other people who eat anything
sentences.korean_translation: 무엇이든 먹는 다른 사람들을 비판해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: They are not doing anything wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아무 잘못된 것을 하지 않고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: because God himself has accepted them
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 하나님께서 직접 그들을 받아주셨기 때문입니다
